text:
When trying to edit a Document with Forms I get the following Error:

Unable to get transformer handler for
${TOMCAT_ROOT}/webapps/lenya/lenya/pubs/default/lenya/xslt/formeditor/homepage.xsl

After checking the SVN repository I found that the file exists in the trunk but
not in the BRANCH_1_2_X branch.

After copying the file from the trunk in the correct directory of the
BRANCH_1_2_x branch the form editor works as expected.
creator: suriver@gmail.com
agallardo@agsoftware.dnsalias.com
text: File is back on the 1.2 branch, please cross check and close the bug
